main event: An unidentified metallic object hovered over Lubbock, Texas for six minutes before moving east and disappearing into a cloud bank.
interesting points: Witnesses observed bright lights in the sky described as amber in color and oval or circular in shape,The lights traveled at a high rate of speed at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet,The objects were estimated to be 30 to 50 feet in diameter,The objects were flying in a staggered formation of about 20 to 30,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 to 15 minutes.
sighted object: a spherical metallic object and a formation of bright lights
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Carl Hart and Mr. and Mrs. Carl Kiehl, reputable citizens of Lubbock
